en: In learning , it can be thought of as a trait that drives a person to keep trying until they succeed .
baseline: 在学习中,它可以被看作是驱使一个人继续努力直到成功的一个特质。

en: The study showed that grit and perseverance were better predictors of academic success and achievement than talent or IQ .
baseline: 研究表明,毅力和毅力比天赋或智商更能预测学术成功和成就。

en: What the results showed was that grit and perseverance were better predictors of academic success and achievement than talent or IQ .
baseline: 结果表明,毅力和毅力比天赋或智商更能预测学术成功和成就。

en: The concept of grit is an easy one to dismiss as something taken for granted .
baseline: 宽容的观念很容易被当作是理所当然的。

en: If the task we are trying to complete is a difficult one , it can take a lot of work .
baseline: 如果我们想完成的任务是困难的,那可能需要很多工作。

en: Failed attempts are viewed as merely part of the process and seen as a very useful way to gain knowledge that moves you toward success .
baseline: 失败的尝试被看作只是过程的一部分,并且被看作是获得你走向成功的知识的非常有用的途径。

en: You know that if you simply read the chapters yet again , there is no guarantee you are going to be any more successful .
baseline: 你知道,如果你只是再读一遍章节,就没有什么保证你将更成功。

en: You determine that you need to find a different approach .
baseline: 你确定你需要找到一种不同的方法。

en: This accomplishes two things : first , you are able to immediately spot areas where you need to learn more , and second , you can check your summaries against the text to make certain what you know is correct and adequate .
baseline: 这可以完成两件事:首先,你可以立即发现你需要学习的领域,其次,你可以对文本进行总结,以确定你所知道的是对的和恰当的。

en: Some scholars believe that between nine and fifteen thousand years ago , a land bridge existed between Asia and North America that we now call Beringia .
baseline: 一些学者认为,九至十五千年前,亚洲和北美洲之间存在着一座陆桥,现在我们称之为伯明尼亚。
